one_reviews_text: My wife and been together 10 years. we have 4 kids.  We used to argue every night and stress out about everything....flash to present day...we cannot wait to get the kids to bed so we can jump on the Oculus and race!!!! Funny story my wife's first time playing we did score mode.  I told her we should probably do a different one because this one is really hard....not only she scored 30k plus points and finished on the first try. I could finish for the life of me...  This game is great for your relationship and will settle arguments... 😃
Worth the money.

review_title: Ripoff if you own both Go and Quest
one_reviews_text:
Same game but requires you purchase the Quest version separate and at double the price. What a joke. There should be a shared library between them and allow the end user to install them at their own risk of compatibility. So many games on the Go and now they want to double dip on the stuff we already paid for.

This is not the games fault, the game is Awesome 5 stars. Oculus needs to stop being so darn greedy.

This game is amazing even if your only using one controller on the oculus go. Rush makes you fell like your actually gliding around mountains and many other places! Rush is an amazing game and is definitely worth the money!

review_title: One of the staple vr titles

review_title: Great game, not worth buying twice.

review_title: Why Do I Have To Buy This Twice?
one_reviews_text:
I love this game. It's great. I'd give it five stars, but I bought it on the Go store expecting that it would also work on my Quest 2 and that's how the case. I feel very very cheated.

I bought a lot of apps and games on the Go store and then went out and bought a Quest 2 as soon as I could, never expecting that I'd have to pay twice for what I already bought just a few months ago.

I'm not happy at all
Very fun to play :)

Best game on the oculus go platform in my opinion. Well worth the money, plenty of levels and different gameplay modes, and nice smooth high quality graphics. If only other game developers were as good as these guys 😂
Its brilliant game its giving you really good experience.

But whenever I went just on top of a mountain it would say that I crashed and I loose. This gets in the way of the game Alot. But other than that I thought te the game was great.

review_title: The other kind of zoom meeting
one_reviews_text:
Tbh it's a relief to find a multiplayer game that still works on the Gear, but this one is a cracker.  It manages to be fast and intense without making me sick, and the bits with the cans and Nerf guns (before and after races) are almost as good as the game.
Took a few attempts to match up with a friend but seemed solid once we got started.
Great!! Attention getter.

So much fun. Very realistic feeling. Keeps you riveted to the action.

Was a good game, but as with most of these apps they stop working after updating my phone and developers don't want to fix them. Gonna attempt refund, not holding my breath. Mark needs his coffee money. Stuck on syncing

I enjoy this game...now I can be up in the clouds☁️, while up in the clouds😤🥦.

On a serious note, the game is fun once you get the hang of the controls. I've had the game glitch out and/or freeze up during gameplay a few times, that's the only hurdle I struggle with.
It just syncs for hours on end. It was a good game whe  I could play it though.
Fun lots of fun but hold on

Great work on the scenery’s, cliff diving seemed real, not scary just a rush of beautifulness in its tracks within like being able to almost know what it feels like to fly and be free. I’m a young disabled mother with not much money, health or energy to take my children places. I want y’all to know that this invention feels heaven sent. It hurts to drive or ride in a car which sucks for my family that means no traveling 😭🤦‍♀️ but you’re games help us to travel and actually just feel alive which is hard for most healthy type people to do even much less me..

review_title: Just barely got this game AND ITS AWESOM

review_title: This game is awesome by the graphics
one_reviews_text: Yep

review_title: Not bad and fun to play
one_reviews_text: I love the different scenarios in the game it’s not very hard to unlock the levels👍👍👍

The whole reason I got an oculus was bc I wanted to find a wing suit game and a zombie shooting game. RUSH is well worth it. So fun to push the limits. And they did real good on scenery love the snow day one

Ive been beginning to question the capability of VR games on the oculus go. So many games on this are poorly made and seem to be unfinished. This game though, THIS GAME IS AWESOME!

Even though it is such a simple game there is so much to do and it is so much fun. You can race other players and, even though it is a race, at the end of the match it turns onto almost a social hangout where you can blast each other with little guns or spray soda at towers of boxes. 

If you haven’t bought this game yet, you should seriously think about getting it.
Great game very much recommended 😃

You know that feeling you get in your balls when you’re on a really fast rollercoaster? This game gives me that feeling. It’s so immersive and the controls are so smooth, especially if you go in settings and make it so you tilt your controller to steer. As a person who’s always had dreams of flying, this game is as close as I’ll get. Very fun way to procrastinate my homework while this virus is going on. Download it!

I'm new to VR. Started out on the Go and have come to realize that many games on the store are quite disappointing.

This game is not one of those. A little glint of light in the dark caves that is Oculus Go games.

It's easy enough to get into, the tutorial helps a bit. Simple concept, but very wonderfully executed. The lobbies with the intractable stuff help kill some time while you wait for other players to finish the race. It's an overall great experience that I recommend to everyone who is otherwise disappointed in the selection of games on the Go.
How do u download this? Its only saying purchased 😡 my lil boy is so upset its his birthday present

This game is addicting. My headset actually overheated playing this lol.

The best way to describe is like a next level version of racing games in the arcade but wing suits instead of cars.

Beautiful levels and music. The sharp turns and close calls are exhilarating! Lots of different course layouts and different things you can do on here.

Definitely worth the $8

The Oculus Go  games have left me a bit disappointed but this game rocks. It’s immersive and fun and a great escape from the current reality. I finally got to do a race with other people. Seems like more people are playing now so it’s fun to play with other live people. Definitely worth it.

I don't know if these other reviews were bought out or what, but this game is terribly disappointing. The multiplayer scene is dead, you will rarely find players. The single player has tons of "levels" that are just a 3 degree variation from the previous track. Even worse, the gameplay itself is hardly even fun ( you won't feel any butterflies playing this with such low res graphics). Absolutely the least enjoyable game I've bought on oculus with it's only redeeming(and actually good quite good) feature is the knick knacks you play around with when in a waiting room

It's a fun game that feels pretty realistic at times. 

It would be awesome if there was more feedback on which things make you go faster. Cutting corners? Dipping and then leveling out? It's not really clear yet. I've only played it for a few hours now. 

Although as someone who used to skydive and fly wingsuits, there are some inaccurate elements that could have been accurate with very minor research. The parachute toggles. The ring configuration on the rigs. 

Anyways all in all recommend!

review_title: Perfect mix of experience and challenge.

Best value for dollar that I’ve found so far!  80 different courses in Race mode alone!  You know it’s a good game when you think about it when you’re not playing it.  QLove this game!

So you've got VR goggles, and you want a game that will really give you an exciting, immersive experience? This is that game. Game mechanics are a bit sparse, but who cares? The focus of the game is providing an immersive 'wingsuit experience', and it does that magnificently. I love how the entire play->finish->play again cycle is extremely short: I don't really care how many points I've scored, I want to get back up in the air again! I haven't tried multi-player mode yet, but it seems like it could be a blast. I think that a LOT of Oculus Gos were sold this holiday season, so I'm expecting / hoping that the number of players will swell.
This is perfect. I ll waiting for more game like this!In one place gut fly simulation ,racing and real so much fun for everyone and everyday.

Rush is a great game that works perfectly on the Oculus go. The game delivers a fun and exciting experience as you zoom through the mountains, getting the feeling of falling. The graphics are gorgeous, especially the sunset maps, and the 3D effects really gives you a sense of depth. The mountains and hills look like they are actually miles away, while the helmet looks like it’s right there on your head. In addition, the interactive airplane which holds the menu, is really fun. I enjoy picking up the little gun and shooting darts all over. Playing basketball or opening a soda and letting it fly around is also really entertaining. Overall, this game is a great and immersive experience that is definitely worth the money.
Just love this game, works great on go, multi-player is a bonus.
I have just recently downloaded & played Rush & so far I love it! Very fun & I love the multiplayer for my family to play together 👍👍
If Your looking for a thrilling, fun, and competitive game, This is the one. Absolutely no problems with the game. Amazing. Would give it 10 Stars if I could.
Hands down no contest no other VR game gives you the “real feeling of experience” then this game! This game really has you feeling like it’s real! After playing this game, all other VR games suck!
This is an excellent VR game - very immersive and you can feel the rush!!
Thia game is dope.. It really feels like your soaring!

This is a great first experience that provides longevity with interesting mechanics. Not very many mechanics, but just enough to pull through and keep going through the five stages and many different courses through those stages. It really is quite enjoyable to sail down a mountain￼ and it has not lost its shine despite the many hours I have put into it already.￼
Well worth the money. My first purchased game on Oculus and it’s amazing. It’s such a rush and just challenging enough without being too hard.

this game is great but for some reason i even have fun in the lobby lol

I found it kinda boring and definitely not worth the 7.99 but I added an extra star for the suction cup dart guns.. detailed in my blog here: www.jonathanposton.com/2019/12/rush.html

Love this game, particularly the Race portion. I've only raced against the NPCs, but greatly appreciate the fact that it's also possible to race against players online. I also like the Score Trials, but think both it and the Time Trial sections would be more exciting if they also included NPCs to race/trial against, perhaps with them as "ghosts". 

Also, for some reason, the first eight or nine races against the NPCs in the Canyon Section were insanely easy to win; it'd be nice if the developer made those races comparable to the first two environments, in terms of having to race and figure out strategies for winning. 

In any event, this game has been very enjoyable, the sensation of flying is great, and no sickness at all, which I can sometimes be prone to. HIGHLY recommend!

Simply one of the best games and experiences currently on the the Go. Great graphics, really immersive seat of your pants stuff, fast, fun and real replay value. It takes skill and the more you play, the better you get! Have been playing it for months and today tried the online multiplayer mode for the first time, racing against a random stranger. This really added an extra layer of fun. Simply put, get it if you haven’t already.

Honestly,  i wasn't expecting to like this game as much as I do. But this is one of my favorite go-to games for the Go. It is amazingly fun and the replayability factor is incredible!

Update: With every update, this game keeps getting better and better!
One of my favorite games

game looks like it will be a lot of fun if only we can get the multiplayer option to work...which is why we purchased it.

We each have our own account
We both purchased the game.
We are on the same WIFI.
Once we go into the multiplayer option we can see each other on the invite friends board but when we send a request to join it keeps going in circles and the name fades out. it does this endlessly. We tried rebooting headsets changing networks and nothing has fixed this issue. We can play all our other multiplayer games just fine against each other. So its just Rush that isn't working. Help!!.

Flying above mountains in VR is just great.

Still, I lack games that will push me to the edge of my "agility". This one feels about too easy.

I understand that Go is a more arcade headset, still I feel it's possible to make more hard games for it.

For example, I'd pay for the Hard mode with harder tracks.
Great game!!
Best 3d experience out there and an instant wow effect. Looks very similar to the PC oculus version. Very rich.

This was one of the best games for Gear VR, but will not run on my s8 after a recent update. I tried reinstalling, but keep getting a message saying Oculus needs to be updated. I am willing to give 5 stars if I find a solution,  but can't seem to find support
~Update: The issue appears to be fixed, so am giving 5 stars as stated.

This is a great game. It's a favourite with all my family. I have it on the Oculus Go, the Rift and now the Quest. Now for a couple of requests for the developers.

Request 1
You proudly offer crossplay.  but I can't play with my grandchildren (even though I have the game three times on three headsets) because my headsets are all on one Oculus account - I can't add myself as a friend.
Please, please, please let us crossplay together. The game Slightly Heroes lets us play with a Go versus a Rift by using a code. Please check that game out to see that it can be done.  My grandson, Teddie, really loves this game. It would be amazing if I could race him (and his dad) to the bottom of the mountain.

Request 2
I work with elderly and disabled people who sometimes have little or no movement in their hands. However, they can move their heads.  They can play this game by moving their head once I get them past the menus and they are standing on the mountain top. They can gaze to start and fly to the bottom of the mountain. They can't boost, but they still love the freedom of flight.
Can you please have a hands-free option and make the menus operable by hands-free gaze control too? Then they could control the game themselves. That would be very empowering for a person with limited mobility. The menus would be easy to make hands-free. I'm not sure about boost - perhaps a head flick or something or automatic boost areas. I'm sure you can work something out.
Great game. Please make it accessible for everyone.
Really cool skies for a gear vr game
You need this game!!! The developers created an immersive & enjoyable flying experience.
I didnt expect to enjoy it as much as i do. I end up racing and playing with some of the same people .... so much fun !!
This is a great game little motion sickness not bad playable. Very fun game and fun to watch people that are afraid of heights

review_title: Great Game!  I keep coming back to it!
one_reviews_text: Great job with this game!  So fun and easy to play!  Money well spent.

Since I got a response here in the reviews it must be some glitch with the website or at least for me as there was no selection for Rush to in the drop-down menu on the support page for email to contact but I'm happy to change my review since I was contacted the game is very fun especially multiplayer the physics of the guns and everything else while you're waiting in the plane is actually a pretty cool!
review_feedback: Hi xxxpogoxxx - glad we were able to clear it up for you! Please don't hesitate to ever get in touch with us should the need arise. Have fun! :)

review_title: A rush? No, but lots of fun
one_reviews_text:
Based on what I’d been reading about Rush, once the title came up for sale, it was a must-get game for me. The thought of wing suit flying down mountains and treetops was too much to resist. And once I played, the game more or less delivers what it promises. I’ll definitely be in the minority in expressing slight disappointment with it, but I wouldn’t dare discourage you from getting it. There’s a lot to like here. For one thing, the visuals are gorgeous. The scenery is about as breathtaking as can be in VR. As you stand on the platform looking around at your fellow flyers in anticipation of beginning the race, looking out at the vistas below you, the game captures that immersion well, at least for those few moments. The gameplay is smooth, with no lag or stuttering. It feels accurately timed and the controls feel precise. One can tell that a lot of care went into making the experience as glitch-free as possible. The music is really upbeat and fun, and although you can imagine lots of great songs accompanying these jumps, what is provided here is very well-suited and enjoyable. There is also a tremendous amount of replay value here. The game can be completed but you can then go back and try for a perfect three-score on each jump. There’s multiplayer and plenty of game modes, as well as collecting various wing suits, to add to the variety. 

So why was I not positively giddy about the game? There’s a few reasons why. Some are superficial, others more crucial. There’s a lot of background-rendering as you descend, which always cheapens the effect for me, but that probably helps explain why the game runs so smooth. That is at least much preferable to a perfectly-executed graphic that stutters ad nauseam. There are 4 main environments with multiple variations of the map within. Each jump is technically unique, but unfortunately not unique enough. After a while, you do start to feel like you’re doing the same thing over and over, which lessens the enjoyment. Lastly, and most importantly, I bought this game looking for what the title implies: a rush. Contrary to what others have said, I felt no sensation of actual flying. Standing certainly helps a bit, but I never once got the butterflies in my stomach that I was hoping to get. It seems like others have, and maybe you would too, but that was my honest experience.

In all, I still recommend the game, especially if you can get it on sale. I may not be as enthusiastic about it as most, but by no means is it a bad game. It’s still a blast to play. Just for me, personally, I’m still waiting for that definitive experience that provides the VR shot of adrenaline many of us seek.
Great  fun game. It’s easy to keep playing this game

This game is fantastic, the best of all those I have downloaded on Oculus Go, which are now more than 100. It is adrenaline-fueled, engaging, perfect in graphics and physics, infinite as playability, creates little or no nausea thanks to the fact that the head is used to curve .. A masterpiece that alone justifies the purchase of the Oculus Go. It gives me almost the same adrenaline and pleasure of driving my motorbike in the mountains. In this regard, I hope that the developers will consider the development of a motorcycle simulator for which they could use the same fantastic scenarios, physics and controls of Rush

First of all the quality of the vr game is excellent. From the start I really like the UI and the music. Then into the game the sensation of falling and flying is surprisingly good. The graphics are good but it's because the underpowered of graphics in my mobile phone. The weather effects are good too. The controller works very precise. The music is enjoyable specially the third level one. You can also grab objects and throw them before the loading scenes. Now they have added a fourth world which is good but they need to optimize it for mobile phones because lags a lot in a S8. Note: please could you optimize the 4th world. Music and graphics were good too.
A good game

Just be aware if you purchased for Go and now upgraded to the Quest, they make you buy the game again. They only allow between Rift and Quest. The developer said Oculus doesnt allow it but Oculus told me it is completely up to each developer. Seems like a quick money grab. Too bad...especially after upgrading to Quest. Just an fyi.
review_feedback: Hi msweat2018 - thanks for your feedback. Just to clarify, Oculus do not offer any facility for us to enable cross-buy between Go and Quest. Anyone at Oculus that might have told you this or that "it is up to the developer" is misinformed. Oculus DO offer cross-buy between Rift and Quest (which we happily support) but it's simply not an option for Go. Thanks.

one_reviews_text: I bought this game for Go and loved it. Show it to my friends whenever I demo VR for them, hence why I am not happy, that I would have to buy the game on Quest again, when it doesn't seem much of an upgrade.

It's a great and fun game! Tons of challenges (all very similar, though) in four scenarios and different gameplay modes should give you a lot of bang for your money. Graphics are pretty good, interactivity is much better than expected. But most importantly, gameplay is very well designed: there's no learning curve to start enjoying the game, but it can take a while to master it.

I bought this on the Oculus Go for my nine years old grandson to play when he comes round. He loves it and picked it up really quickly. He soon started competing and amazed me at how well he does. I've tried it and found it fun but challenging. But then I am older! I well recommend anyone to buy it. Well worth the money. Well done to the designers.
Excellent fun. I got the oculus go for my birthday. (53 ) oldest virtual oap. Haha. This was brill and rush sends the adrenaline up. Brill
I love this game! It's smooth, fast, and exciting. I have a lot of great games on my go, but this one gets the most replays. A no brainer in my opnion as long as your good with fast motion in vr.

This is one of the best games ive played, good sitting down and even better standing up if you can handle it... great game with good graphics loads of levels gold, silver and bronze. You unlock faster suits the more you complete. Wicked game hope they add more soon, id pay for more tracks or a Rush 2.. excellent game 5 stars

I bought this application for the Oculus Go. I am very happy with the game and has provided many hours of fun. I love the ability to play with my friends who also have VR headsets. Graphics are good and never seem to have frame rate issues. Would absolutely recommend.
We cast this to our TV during a family cookout and had loads of fun. Use the option of steering by looking to avoid motion sickness.
Very fun, cool game.
One of the best high octane games on the oculus go one I keep going back too brill
Rush is a very unique and great racing game.It is one of those games that gets very addictive!
Need...more...levels...
the update really improved an already good game thx guys!
Great game . My favorite vr title .
Super fun multiplayer and single player game!
Probably one of the best for GO!
It’s good bruh
I love it! It really is a rush!
This is as cool as it can get!!  Endless jumps that get more challenging as you progress.  Breaks are needed to re-orient yourself. A+

I love this game. Right from the first jump, I was hooked. I am just glad no one can see me playing it. I can’t help but getting into it. And racing others is awesome. There are some cool people out there to fly with. So come on let’s do this thing.
Pretty Dam amazing. Had I known this is where VR gaming is at the moment I would have gotten one sooner. This exactly the type of game to showcase this type of platform. What a ride!
You don’t have to be a gamer to enjoy Rush! From races to scoring points, Rush is appropriately challenging and so much fun to play. Who doesn’t want to fly from the safety of the couch???

I’ve been having so much fun with this game. I’m new to the VR world and this is actually the first game I bought. It’s so fun soaring around and hitting them rings and diving down cliffs. Multiplayer is kinda of iffy, I’ve only found 1 person to play with outta the few times I’ve tried queuing up. One thing that sucks is that my friend had this on the Rift and I’m on the Go and there’s no cross-platform play. Would really like if this game could have that so I could play with him. Other than that I’m really loving this game.
Initially i was skeptical...I didn’t expect much out of this game.  But fortunately I was wrong.  This is a fun VR experience.   Finally, my money wasn’t waisted on a game.

review_title: Want to Play Online with Friend
one_reviews_text: This game would be an awesome game to play with friends/online. I got this for the multiplayer side of things but I've only played single player and it better then the pics make it look. I can't wait to play this multiplayer.
This is actually a pretty fun game, despite how silly you look while playing it. The gameplay is really engaging and it's a fun title to come back to.

The game is fun and each location is beautiful. The only thing that takes away a star is the wait time for a game to start in multiplayer with a random player. They enter the room but they don’t have the option to hit the ready button for everyone to start. We just stand around in the plane until somebody eventually leaves. Please fix this.

There could be one more mountain. Instead of the high number of routes on each terrain, but overall a nice game.

UPDATE:
The developers did a superb job on updating this game! They added a new beautiful mountain. Added stuff to play with, before and after a race. Graphics options and so much more! Lately, they even improved the visual presentation with new textures and different times of day etc.

It became my favourite game to play on my Oculus GO. A must have!
Worth the money. It’s very addicting though.
Wish it would say what the different suits do

This experience is amazing. The visuals and how real it feels is so breath taking! If you have to buy one game get this, it's worth it. You can play alone through alot of courses, online multi-player or with friends. I would only ask that you add more levels SOON so I can get another mind  blowing ✈ flight 😍 through the sky.

When I first got this game I hated it. The first map was trash and it gave me motion sickness. But when I completed that map I started liking the game. I like that there’s a chute that’s a good feature too. And the infinite nerf gun and soda cans. Just a very fun game
Wow to feel like I’m really flying through the sky and to race other people as well simply amazing !!!

IM WONDERING IF I CAN USE THIS ON MY OCULUS QUEST? IN MY QUEST PURCHASE HISTORY IT SAYS I HAVE ALREADY PURCHASED THIS ITEM?? OR MAYBE A DISCOUNTED RATE SINCE I BOUGHT IT ALREADY?🤔I MEAN IT LOOKS LIKE THE TOTAL SAME GAME.
Sweet.

review_title: I was so surprised how intense this is!
one_reviews_text: I am a Windlands VR veteran so I have good VR legs I think. I bought Rush without much expectation but was blown away by the intensity of the VR experience in the very first level (the tutorial is not very immersive, wait for the first level before you judge!). I cannot recommend this experience enough if you already have good VR legs.

Excellent Oculus go game, keep coming back for more only! My only complaint is multiplayer, should allow to join a game all ready running. Than would be five starts for sure multiplayer is vary barren. I think this would fix that issuie. If you could join a race in progress.
Fabulous game a must bye.
This is an amazing game!! You’ll definitely feel like jumping!!!

review_title: Awesome, must have for flight lovers
one_reviews_text: Great BASE sim. Multiple control options and very immersive. I would love to see different drop points such as bridges and antenna towers. It will definitely get your heart pumping. As a flight sim and b.a.s.e jumping sim guy this along with ultrawings, overflight and a couple others are must haves on the Oculus go.

review_title: The BEST game for VR on Oculus Go!
one_reviews_text: The game is 95% perfect, aside from some small random bugs: I had narrowly beat the AI (Ben) with a time of 2.04.484, and although his time only showed as 2.04.54 the game decided he beat me! The only annoying thing really is when you are in Random waiting too long for the game to start when another human player joins - frustrating when they then decide to leave because they're waiting too long! Also, please include an option in Random play to rejoin other human players you're racing against if you (or they) crash! If you (or they) crash into something during a race - if they choose to retry or continue without waiting for you to finish the race (or you do if you've crashed into something) then suddenly you're not playing against them anymore and are back to racing against the AI again... which means you then have to exit and choose Random again and wait! At least give us (or other human players) an option to rejoin together at the next race or something please! Other than that, it's a great game and needs more levels please!

On Gear VR (S9), this is by far my most favourite game for replaying. The gameplay is so simple, and even the soundtrack is great. In the most recent update, graphics resolution is improved, and boosting seems better. Crank the resolution slider to 2.0!

Hi i purchased this game on the daily deal and was charged as i was sent a confirmation email from oculus of my purchase. The game is showing up on my oculus library but will not install or will install then at 100 percent ask me to install again. When i place my phone in my gear vr it doesnt show up. Can i please get some help. I have tried restarting my phone but that didnt work

I am not able to load this app. It is the only one giving me trouble. It says that an Oculus Update is required and to visit the support site on the Oculus website. I will revise to 5 Stars when this gets fixed. Please let me know if you have any suggestions. Thank You.

Update: the game was updated, and it has lots of totally awesome improvements!!! Better textures, night and day support, steer with controller and freely look around, love to the detail!!! Amazing, awesome, wooooha! This is already my favorite!!! 7/5 at least!! 

Love that. To the Devs: are you flying faster closer to the ground, does height matter here? For boosting continuously: Do I need to keep the trigger pressed when very close to the ground?
Update: This is the game played the most for me. I would love to see more people online for multiplayer. Hoping for the European release via Amazon soon...
review_feedback:
Hi Sebastian - thanks for your review! Glad to hear you're enjoying the update :) 
As for boosting, you only need to pull the trigger once to start then if you can manage to stay close to the gound and walls while boosting, you'll be able to maintain it. Happy Holidays!

one_reviews_text: Great game and visual effects are superb. Well done to the developers.

I will say it’s fun but I have a suggestion for the boost because I play a lot of racing games and the boosts u can stop by pressing the boost button again so you can save it. I believe this would be helpful when your about to run into a wall and ur boosting because I crashed a few times doing that with the boost

Updated at Dec 27th,
Today, I've tried to launch the application, again. It works correctly!!
Thank you for your support!
Will play continue a while.

I bought RUSH application for Oculus Go.
I could not start this application, the device keep display message "Now, updating".
I'm waiting for complete this updating , however Oculus Go is 
showing  the message that is  "Keep turn on the device and Wifi connection for a while for finishing update.".
Even if  tried un-installing and re-installing few times, also tried shutdown the device and also re-started the device, Oculus go is keeping this issue.
review_feedback:
Hello Thomas - your device is in fact updating and it can take a few hours for this to complete. Please be sure to leave the device on and close to the wifi source and check it periodically. You'll know its ready when the device shows at least:

Version: 3.54.33.131643470
Runtime Version: 3.6.3.130862347
OS Version: 178890.1870.154

You can check this in Settings > See All > About - if you continue to have any issues please do reach out to us at https://thebinarymill.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new - thanks!

one_reviews_text: Brilliant for sure!!!this game got my whole family come together and have a big competition.This game is brilliant for both adults and children and I personally enjoy the lovely backgrounds in the game! I also love the tense music and the voice of a woman cheering you on as you sky dive.Who ever made this game is a genius and I hope you make many more brilliant games in the future.I rate this game 1000000000000000000000000 and so on!!!

People that say vr games are boring, did not purchase games like this one... Its so thrilling, and at a good price... just go get it.

____
Update: I have it for months now. I still find this game one of the most interesting games in vr.

So I got this game and I played with it and made it through the tutorial, at this point I had played for like 15 minutes. So I joined multiplayer mode and I was in this air plane and I tried turning on voice chat and that the whole game froze everything froze I turned and all I saw was black. I powered it on and back on and I saw the same thing of the frozen thing. I spammed the controller and I finally got out. I thought it was over and then I saw black dots all over my screen. The app was still there and I think that’s what caused it all. I tried going back into the app and I’ll I saw was the frozen spot so now I can’t even play it and my oculus go is wrecked and it’s all I got for crishtmas. 😥
review_feedback: Hi Tom - very sorry to learn of your troubles playing Rush. Unfortunately it looks like you might have a faulty Oculus Go. Have you tried to reset the device yet? Here's a guide to help you with that: https://www.androidcentral.com/how-reset-your-oculus-go - alternatively you can take a look through Oculus' support site for more help or perhaps reach out to them if none of the suggested fixes work: https://support.oculus.com/go/ - you are of course also welcome to reach out to us for more assistance however this does look to be a hardware fault. Here's how to reach us: https://thebinarymill.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

First game purchased on Oculus Go. Great game. Easy learning curve. Progressively challenging. I like making friends in the online portion of this game. I docked one star, because portions of this game get repetitive. The music. The lounge area.

review_title: You will not regret the experience
one_reviews_text: This game is amazing.  The feeling of flying, the sound, and the competition are excellent.  I chose the random player and was so pleased with the game, especially when I caught on to using the nerf gun whilst in the plane.  I usually only purchase scary vr products, but this, by far, is one of my best picks.

This game is gorgeous. 
The gameplay is really fun, the visuals are outstanding and the feeling of speed is right there.

One of the game I demo everytime I want someone to try VR. Felt in love with it! Especially the nerf guns !

Makes so much fun! 
Is striktly addictive!
The Nerf guns are awesome!

I started at 4:20 😉 and it was all you could ask of a phone vr game. Great graphics with little to no lag! Best thing I've gotten so far for the Gear!

review_title: Many tracks or Not? Fun either way
one_reviews_text:
How you feel about this game's value depends a lot on whether you feel the 25 tracks within each of the 3 environments are 25 different tracks, or the same thing 25 ways. Big difference between 3 tracks and 75. I'm kind of in the middle. Some of them clearly take you past and through different scenery pieces like waterfalls and tunnels that you don't see in other tracks. Some of them feel fairly redundant.

Sense of motion is pretty good, game itself is pretty fun. Graphics are good but not great. Would love to see more specific pieces of scenery in the environments (ie more bridges or houses vs just open space). If we got an expansion with 2-3 more environments I'd say for sure it's worth your money, but I don't regret my purchase.

UPDATE: new update has additional track, better resolution, and some other little upgrades. Recommend you buy it!

Update 2: now I see the Binary Mill logo screen, but then only blackness no matter how long I wait. What's going on? On an S7
Awesome game!!! Runs smooth, and the response to movement is on point.  A must have for Gear Vr and Oculus Go users. Feel free to add me so we can dive together!!!
Bought it, but installation is not possible. Thanks for nothing!
This game is the closest to a full VR experience on GO. Not limited by the 3dof it feels like you are leaning into the game. Loads of stages,multiplayer too, great fun.

Not sure why some folks said this is really immersive?  It’s ok, but the graphics are kind of low resolution.  Also the physics seem off, it feels like flying a glider aircraft, not so much a wing suit.

Love this app but the latest update has added a weird black vignette on it for the oculus go that’s super broken and moves when you turn your head, making it very uncomfortable to play. Please fix that and it’ll be back to a five star rating :)
review_feedback: Hi makanivalur. In the Options menu in the 'System' tab you'll see a comfort slider - it sounds like that has been turned all the way up. Please try reducing that slider back down and the black vignette on the sides should retract accordingly. Please let us know if you continue having any issues!

one_reviews_text: This game is very cool

One of the most immersive games I’ve played so far. Graphics and music are good, and the gameplay is super addictive. You do control your direction with head movements, but it makes sense in terms of game mechanics, and only helps with the immersion :) I can’t recommend this title enough!!
A must have for oculus go it runs smoothly and is very addicting , amazing game!
This game sucks. I wish I can have my money back
Its like ssx tricky in the air.

This is one of my favorite VR experiences! It’s very well done, a ton of fun, excellent visuals, and actually gets my heart pumping as I whoosh past obstacles at breakneck speeds!

If you like flying you’ll love this. Looking forward to seeing what future updates hold. Would love to see different perspectives. A whole body view perspective might be cool?! Nice work to the creators!

I’ve had a great time. Very slick gameplay, and really easy to pick up and play. Problem is- multiplayer doesn’t work for me. I’ve done everything correctly- launch the app with friends via oculus parties, but we both just get stranded on the pre-jump airplane cargo cabin. The screen says waiting for friends to join and just spins endlessly. I’ve restarted the application, the headset, tried getting my friend to launch the app, we’ve clicked start together- but nothing works. Very frustrating. You’d expect a simple feature like this to work flawlessly in a paid application, but it doesn’t. I’m afraid the novelty will quickly fade away with solo jumps as my only option.
review_feedback: UPDATE: RUSH 2.1 update is now out with these and other multiplayer fixes/additions. Hi arkfly - thanks very much for your feedback. We will look into this issue right away. This was working so we'll be sure to dig in and see what might be happening here. We're also making several improvements to multiplayer and we expect that update to be out in a couple of days. That update should also fix multiplayer for you. Apologies for the inconvenience!

one_reviews_text: A high quality title worthy of your time and money. Excellent graphics ... My stomach dropped more than once. I beat the game and now I'm hoping for some more via DLC

This will allow players to continue in single player while waiting for other random people to jump with. We expect the update to be available in a couple of days.

review_feedback: Thanks for the feedback! We encourage low-flying by rewarding players with boost generation as it conveys a more thrilling experience. However many of the later courses, especially on Canyon, offer much more high-flying experiences that you might prefer. Regardlees, we'll definitely take the feedback on-board for future updates!

It sucks trying to explain to somebody what you did and they have no idea what you're talking about. Please add more courses because I have almost beaten them all and I NEED more!
UNABLE to download & install but took my money anyway !! Buyer Beware total RIP OFF don't buy this app they will take your money and you won't be able to download or install game.
review_feedback: Hello - sorry to hear you are having issues with the download. Have you tried completely closing the Oculus app, then restarting your phone and trying to install again? Do you have plenty of free space on your device (1gb+)? If you continue having problems installing, please contact us via https://thebinarymill.zendesk.com/hc/en-us as well as Oculus direct through their support system as they can better handle troubleshooting related to download issues.

one_reviews_text: More of a snooze than a rush..really not exciting at all
Finally got it to download will review after a day or 2 after play

This is a brilliant game, the feeling of speed and height are so good.
I am hoping for some new levels!
The screen can't run in black. I installed a Rush program ...
Felt like someone snapped my neck after i was done playing bending my neck to fly around and shi

Holy moly!! This game is TOTALLY WORTH BUYING. Anyone who has always wanted to fly needs this game. The graphics are good, especially considering this a vr game. Its 8 dollars out of your paycheck that will give you a lot of enjoyment.

This game looks quite polished and its fun to play the first few times. However i have some major complaints keeping me from playing it more. The overall Performance is good, but the Framerate drops every few Seconds on my clean installed s7. A bit less eye candy for a smoother ride would be great. Second thing is the missing controller support. This game would rule if able to look and fly in different directions. Now its like "focus the next ring" over and over again, which is not that immersive as it could be. Last thing is the warp tracer effect that should induce a feeling of speed but really annoys me. Coming back when controller support is implemented.
This is the best VR experience I have come across!!

Ok. I won't lie. I wasn't expecting great things. The video clip doesn't do it justice.
However, I admit I was wrong. It's very addictive and I was very surprised to feel slight motion sickness on some of the turns. It wasn't uncomfortable by any means, but it did add to the experience.
I'm pleased I purchased this. Well done team.
Test
This game is awesome the free-fall is incredible nice graphics... but sometimes it takes too long to load into the game you got to have patience.. but overall it's a nice game
I wish I can get a refund. This is a miss could have been great. It should let you glide freely checking out the nature instead of focusing on and moving through the goofy rings.
review_feedback: Hi there - that's a great idea! We'll look at add a completely free-roam mode in a future update :)

one_reviews_text:
You need the motion controller if you dont want to use the touchpad, a normal game controller cannot be used. 

Also, the only negative, there is no option to mute or adjust volume of voice narration and to be honest, the sfx of voice + pitch hurts my ears, so im forced to play with volume very softly which kind of takes away from the experiance. 

other than that, its certainly a great experience to be had!
It downloaded and gets to the installation which it seems to nearly finish then says installation failed. No reason given and no notifications.  Plenty of storage space. Very disappointed.

one_reviews_text: This a gem of a game on samsung vr. Nothing complicated but a great great great way to play in vr. Thanks
On my S8+, after one or two races, the game starts leading like crazy. Uninstall, requesting refund.
This game is so epic.The only thing I would like to see in the new update is a mini map
At last a wonderful game that uses the VR. Comfortable and fun challenging and easy at the same time. Great app to have.
Awesome game . more challenges please
I feel uncomfortable when playing
Free flight mode (without mission targets) missing. Otherwise excellent.
Cool
The game is short take advantage of it
Nice game
It's a great game.
It says loads of courses but its really the same but different routes.

The feeling of descending a mountain in a wingsuit is believable and awesome. The game is quite polished too and ideal for pickup and play. Lots to unlock too and there is multiplayer, very feature rich!

As a downside, what does annoy me to great extend is how washed out the colours are in-game. All galaxy devices have gorgious screens, but sure what's up with that.
better than all the rest no Simply the best
Very Like this kind of games. But it's (Too SLow) when u Flying in the game…Cloud you Please make it  faster and better.Thank you so much!
Great

This is really fun. Heres some suggestions: add more places to fly and race at like a downtown, a beach,  The graphics r really nice but just improve em just a little  more. Heck maybe even add a night location too. Hope there b improvements and more features coming soon. Thanks devs!

It's fun but not as exciting as I expected. The graphics don't really make me feel that immersed in the experience. I haven't gotten to the harder tracks yet, but all the levels go down the same mountains but with different routes with checkpoints in different areas, so it does feel somewhat repetitive. You don't feel like you are going too fast which may be to prevent motion sickness and the models of your competitors seem small in scale when they are flying around you. There's no feeling of vertigo or jumping from actual large heights  since everything is low poly its just not that immersive. Soundtrack is incredibly repetitive also.

Luvvvvv it!  Been dying waiting for a proper free drop simulator..this one definitely hit the mark, in fact it exceeded my expectations..its a great thought out game, aswell as the experience I was not expecting! not too uncomfortable but feet up on a swivel seat & you feel it just right .. lots of challenges incl race mode which is epic! And via multiplay is optional + it's quick! .. simply luv it..for the experience! Well worth a go! And 6☆

This game is awesome. I have nothing bad to say other than please please add more challenges. Worth every £ though it's brilliant plus I feel like I've done a work out every time I play. Good job great game. Add me people.
Nice graphics, easy control, quite challenging!

It's okay but lost interest pretty quickly as there is not much to do.  On the plus side it works well smooth flying and no crashes. Installation went great, graphics are good, plane has detail, well developed.  Just was a little boring for me personally but everyone likes different types of games.

Hi. 
First I wish to congratulate and big thanks for the crew.
Jump and flight is amazing - full 2 minutes of adrenaline !!!!!
Music, effects and sweet and sexi voice of my assistant are amazing.
Only one request. Timing is corrupted. I see very old of my times instead of real one I already made. Also - for instance: I got a silver in all races but new wingsuit is not available. When you fix it you will be more then the best !!!!
But HUGE THANKS AGAIN and I'looking forward for your next games.

review_title: This is what I was waiting for!
one_reviews_text:
Have been waiting a long time to play a wingsuit racer in VR that wasn't just a demo. This lives up to to my expectation.
It is a really fleshed out experience. Well wortg the money. 3 game modes on massive 3 locations. Unlockables. Haven't tried online yet but can't wait to race friends. 

Try getting a desk fan and have it blasting in your face; that and the sound effects really immerse you.

My only gripe is the inability to mute the announcer. Unnecessary and can be annoying. Other than that, can't wait to see what else they have planned. Will definitely be coming back to this game time and time again.
Fun stuff and quality GUI.
It would be awesome if there​ was a simple free-play option where there isn't ghosts, opponents, and checkpoints just a finish circle at the bottom
Probably one of the best games I've played so far. The one thing I like to do is turn a fan on high and stand in front of it while I'm playing this game it really adds to the over all effect.
I just brought the game Rush it downloaded and now it's been installing for the past half-hour what do I do
review_feedback: Hi 616solo - sorry to hear you are having troubles running the game. If you could please send details of your device, OS version and any other pertinent information that might help us track down the issue to https://thebinarymill.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and we'll be sure to get you up and running in no time. Thanks!

review_feedback: Hi nikoswavo - sorry to hear you are having difficulty finding players to jump with. As the game is still very new, it might take some time for the player-base to grow for the random games to start matching consistently. In the meantime we recommend inviting your friends via Oculus rooms and playing together with them :)
